title: Israel Criticized For Leaving Pregnant Surrogates In Nepal
teaser: Israel evacuated 26 newborns from Nepal but left behind about 100 pregnant women â€” surrogates, carrying the babies for Israeli parents. Renee Montagne talks to Debra Kamin, a journalist in Tel Aviv.
